snippet: Consumers increased their borrowing in December by the largest amount in 10 months as demand for auto, student and credit card loans showed big gains.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that consumers increased their borrowing in December 2013 by largest amount in 10 months, as demand for auto, student and credit card loans show big gains.
lead_paragraph: Consumers increased their borrowing in December by the largest amount in 10 months as demand for auto, student and credit card loans showed big gains.
